resources.string: <html> <head></head> <body style="text-align:justify;color:black;"> “Nidar - Universal Safety Application” is a personal safety and security application. It takes the necessary actions to bring effective help to you. This includes sending alert messages and siren alarm. </body> </html>

<html> <head></head> <body style="text-align:justify;color:black;"> NIDAR can be activated by voice commands. You only need to say “”, “”, “”, “”. It is better to say one of these keywords multiple times to have a higher chance of getting NIDAR activated. Speech Recognition will work even when your mobile phone is locked or is kept away from you. Once any of the defined keywords are detected, a dialog will be prompted asking for the same. If dialog is not answered within a time frame, an alert message will be sent containing your location. </body> </html>

<html> <head></head> <body style="text-align:justify;color:black;"> NIDAR also detects when you fall. Once, a fall is detected, a dialog will be prompted asking for the same. If dialog is not answered within a time frame, an alert message will be sent containing your location. </body> </html>

<html> <head></head> <body style="text-align:justify;color:black;"> NIDAR keeps track of your battery level. When the battery level is too low, a dialog will be prompted asking for the same. If dialog is not answered within a time frame, an alert message will be sent containing your location. </body> </html>

<html> <head></head> <body style="text-align:justify;color:black;"> To start “Speech Recognition”, “Fall Detection”, “Battery Manager”, just click on the respective buttons on the main activity. Once clicked, service respective to that button will be activated and will ensure your security. The timings for the alert dialog will be for about 15 seconds. It is mandatory to enable GPS beforehand for proper functioning of app. You can also update the contact details by clicking on the “Update Details“ button. </body> </html>
